div.h2: RoboFab + FontTools + Stuff for FontLab 5.0x on OSX
div.p:
Special one-click installer for RoboFab, FontTools and Numeric. This will install all dependencies compiled for PPC, and Python2.3.5 the way FontLab 5.0x likes i.
RoboFab Installer for OSX, FontLab 5.0x

If you don't have fontTools or don't know what fontTools is, take this version. It will install RoboFab and the appropriate FontTools at the same time. FontTools still has a dependency on an older version of Numeric.
In case you have a seperate fontTools install you want to use, these installers contain only RoboFab.

FontTools depends for certain operations on an older version of Numeric. This is the right package. If you want to install this on OSX (and you don't want to use the nice installer listed above) you need to install the OSX Developer Tools first. These can be found on the OSX installer DVD.
